items: Start by standing with your feet hip-width apart and your arms extended in front of you.
Bend your knees and lower your hips as if you were sitting in a chair.
Twist your torso to the right, bringing your left elbow to the outside of your right knee.
Hold the pose for a few breaths, then return to center.
Repeat the twist on the other side, bringing your right elbow to the outside of your left knee.
Hold the pose for a few breaths, then return to center.
Repeat the sequence for several rounds, twisting back and forth between each side.
